comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The poster for the "Grand Commonwealth Fair" occurs in several pictures of George Street, implying they must be contemporary to the event at the Town Hall in November / December 1899. The trams on this part of George St started in December 1899. See other pictures - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3023707402/ and www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3041763769/

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Pubs of Australia, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
